sentences.sContent: We spoke, debated, gossiped into the night.
sentences.sCn: 我们交谈、争论、闲聊到夜间。

synos.tran: 小道传闻；随笔；爱说长道短的人

phrases.pCn: 绯闻少女（美国一青春偶像剧）

words.tran: 爱闲聊的人；搬弄是非者（gossip的名词形式）

trans.tranCn: 小道传闻；随笔；爱说长道短的人
trans.tranOther: someone who likes talking about other people’s private lives – used to show disapproval
If you gossip with someone, you talk informally, especially about other people or local events. You can also say that two people gossip.
